website_summaries.verdict: Style with substance is the most accurate description of the Taos Plim Soul. While most are in agreement with the sneaker's sleek design, its support details are the main reason why this shoe has garnered praises from its wearers.Because of the great support details of the shoe’s insole, people that are accustomed to replacing their shoe's insole with orthotics quickly found the need not to anymore. While there are concerns about the shoe's sizing, women everywhere adored the Taos Plim Soul because of its all-around attributes.
pros: Several of the purchasers are satisfied with the arch support of the Taos Plim Soul
There is a wearer that likes the option to customize the insole
The comfort of this sneaker has been well-received by many users
Because of the sneaker’s quality removable footbed, a lot of the testers who regularly use orthotics found that they do not need to use one anymore
A person who has plantar fasciitis praised this shoe as she can wear it all day without experiencing pain or discomfort
A few of the testers laud the sneaker’s insole because of its superb cushioning
The retro aesthetic of this Taos shoe has received acclaim from most of the wearers
One customer has pointed out that the quality of the shoe’s material is commendable
A couple of users have advised that this sneaker is a great option to wear during tours and vacation due to its support features
Few of the purchasers have decided to secure another pair in different colors because of the overall features of this sneaker
cons: One customer warns that the colors have a tendency to fade quickly
A few of the purchasers are not pleased because they felt it is slightly heavier than it looks

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers I've worn. I'm a longtime Converse wearer but and comfort-wise, these blow them away. The arch support is fantastic, and I was blown away at how cushiony and comfortable they are. And they looker more dressy (if that's possible for sneakers). My show size varies between 7-7.5 and 8 in running shoes. I ordered a 7.5 and they fit perfect wearing them with thin, no-show socks! Really glad I didn't order a size up because I probably would slip right out of them. I have high arches and narrow heals. I'll for sure be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: dcc

customer_reviews.title: I have painful plantar fasciitis in both feet
customer_reviews.text: I have painful plantar fasciitis in both feet. These shoes have great arch support and heel cushion, which make my feet feel amazing! I just bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Springer-Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I just opened the box and I am sending them right back!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this shoe given its good reviews. However, when they got to me, I hated them. There is too much padding in the heel and not enough in the toe box. As one earlier reviewer similarly stated, the padding just drops out of existence once you get to the ball of the foot. The shoe was extremely stiff. So stiff that the heel of the shoe rides, rubbing up and down, the top of my heel. I can see how that would lead to a wicked blister if I were crazy enough to keep wearing the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!  Just order half size up!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw these shoes in a resale shop in Crested Butte, CO in early June. They were too small, so I quickly found them online and ordered my size in 9. They were slightly too small so I returned them and ordered a 9.5 which are perfect! Other reviewers mentioned this but since I'm always true to size in everything else, I went ahead and ordered a 9 first. I'm so happy with these shoes! I get compliments on them all the time and they go with everything...shorts, jeans, etc. I want to buy other colors! They are pricey, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and I do like them a lot. I sized up 1/2 size like suggested by previous reviews and they fit, but very tight if one wants to wear a sock. Much more comfortable worn sockless. The arch is very strong, which is good for me, but may not be for others. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Too small, not enough cushioning in the metatarsal section ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small, not enough cushioning in the metatarsal section, arch support felt lumpy and the transition from the arch to the front of the shoe bumpy and not smooth. Felt snug in terms of the width.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Damn fine shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am officially a fan of these new kicks! I bought a pair for walking a lot in The Netherlands and they needed no breaking in. They have been comfortable, giving more arch support than most shoes nowadays. which my aging body needs. The best part is that they are casual enough to wear nearly anywhere while traveling: cafes, museums, city walks, etc. I will buy these again in another color when I have the $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: EllaCinders

customer_reviews.title: great shoe but narrow toe box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe with a very supportive insole. This is my second pair of Taos and I love my first pair-the Moc Star. The Plim Soul has the same great insoles, unfortunately, the toe box is more narrow on the Plim Soul and they rub my pinky toes so I returned them and ordered another pair of Moc Stars. I highly recommend the Taos brand as a very comfortable shoe for walking and standing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moon

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of different brands in this genre of canvas type shoe and this one is by far the most comfortable and nice looking of them all. The support rivals my adidas running shoe and its such a nice looking shoe that I can wear it with chinos and nice sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Taos sneakers are fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand. I have the Moc Star and I usually wear a size 9. In that style I wore a 10. When I purchased the Moc in a size 10, it was too big. I am returning for a 9-1/2. I have knee and feet issues and I can wear these all day long since they have a great arch support. I gave it 4 stars since I had to send back for a better size
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and the slip on Taos sneakers. Both are going back. These are cute, but too stiff all over and while the insole has arch support, it’s thin in the front. This shoe is a bit wider than the slip on. It’s certainly a nice looking shoe, so if that’s what you’re looking for, maybe give it a try. I found it to be much more comfortable than the slip on, but still too stiff for me.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great Support, Painful Heel
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute! The arch support is amazing and it feels great to walk, except...the heel comes up too high and digs into my skin. I ended up with my skin chaffed and bleeding! It's really a shame because I would love to buy more in other colors but that heel design has got to change because I know other reviewers have mentioned the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Perrier

customer_reviews.title: Arch support is very substantial and makes the shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredible due to the very substantial arch support. They do run small and I ordered a half size up as suggested by other reviewers. The first day I wore on a 2 mile walk to break them in, but no break In was required. They fit so well, do not run, and fit like a glove. The arch support makes all the difference in the comfort of this shoe. I will buy other Co,ors!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoe but gave me blisters, not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes. They were great for style, but I ended up ordering THREE pairs and ultimately settling on semi defective looking shoes. The bottom trim wre never perfectly alligned and the soles of the shoes were often crooked, which I something I did not expect for almost $100 shoes! The arch support was GREAT for such a stylish looking shoe, but I got really bad blisters while walking in Europe after just 2 days (thank God I had a pair of sandals to change into).
customer_reviews.author: Ana Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Hurts ball of foot
customer_reviews.text: There is no protection for the ball of my foot. Very painful after a few steps. Wanted to love these shoes. They look sturdy and well-made. The insole has great arch support but the padding stops before it reaches the area where the ball of my foot rests.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobadoo

customer_reviews.title: You get comfort and looks with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I Bought these shoes for my daughter as a birthday gift. She’s had three other of this exact shoes in different colors. She called me and told me she loves her new shoes.. I have three pairs of these shoes and what I like about him I get comfort and looks
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are OK. I like the Moc Star better. The sole is thicker in the Plim Soul. This makes the shoe stiffer & heavier. I've worn these shoes several times & they still feel like I need to "break them in". The insole works well for me. It's the same as the Moc Star.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. My only slightly negative comment is that the sole is very flat (not the insole, it has a very nice arch support), for me my shins were sore after wearing these because my normal heel-toe cadence was thrown off by the sole of the shoe being so flat. Once I got used to that though, they were great for my trip to Europe where I put ~15 miles a day on them.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Moore

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes constantly slipped in the heel. The heel is very low and doesn’t hug your foot. For $90 shoes I expected way better. I wouldn’t wear them even if they were $10. I gave two stars because they are cute and stylish
customer_reviews.author: MomClrH2o

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for bunions! Order Half size up
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe. Stiff at first. I have bunions on both feet and it is impossible to find a nice looking shoe to wear past 500’ feet. Prior to having bunions I was wearing a size 8. I ordered the half size bigger and fits great. I will be ordering additional pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Linda #62

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, good-looking shoe, great for longer walks.
customer_reviews.text: I am a very easy fit for most any shoe. With this shoe I had to order a half-size larger. At that size these are a wonderful fitting shoe with great arch support and overall comfort. I am often on my feet all day. These shoes stay comfortable all day long. Extremely happy with both the looks and the fit. I will definitely buy more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: JBtoo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I had high expectations and couldn't wait to try these shoes. The shoes were not comfortable to me. Maybe I needed to be fitted instead of trying for myself. I did not get "super comfort" with these shoes so I returned the shoes with NO issues. I did love the look of the shoes and the color. Sure wish they would have worked!
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: Runs small - order a full size up!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have great support and cushioning. They are a bit stiff and take some time to break in. I initially ordered up half a size based on other reviews but I had to exchange for a full size up so I would definitely recommend that anyone order a full size up than what they are used to wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Braun Tangeman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I wanted some stylish sneakers, but Converse and Vans are both uncomfortable for me b/c of their lack of support. These are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for shoes that offered the arch support of Mephisto without the price. Hopefully, these are the ones. Since I have not worn them for a day yet, I will need to post an additional review later. But the feel as I walked around the house was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SewKap

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I bought Taos Plim Souls at a local store when I was dealing with plantar fasciitis this past summer. Loved them. This was my third pair - different colors - and they are the most comfortable shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got some canvas Keds recently but had to put an insert in them for comfort/support. Started looking for another canvas shoe that had good support. These are spot on! I sized up to an 8.5 (am usually an 8) per all of the comments. A little roomy in the toe box but that's probably better than being too tight. Maybe an 8 would have fit??
customer_reviews.author: J. Norford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe in the arch and heel
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe, but fabric is a bit stiff, though it may break in with wear though. Comfortable shoe in the arch and heel, but padding under the ball of foot is hard and thin. Walking distances could be painful, short distances may be ok.
customer_reviews.author: BDMelton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!  Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Wore them all day after I got them and didn’t have any blisters or sore feet. They are low on your ankle so if you don’t like low tennis shoes, I wouldn’t get them. Very comfortable though
customer_reviews.author: Cino

customer_reviews.title: True blue and good for YOU!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Fabulous, my feet felt wonderful from the moment I put them on (my heels had been hurting a lot.) After wearing these shoes all day, the next day I did not wake up with sore feet like I used to. The color is true blue denim, perfect with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Yarina

customer_reviews.title: The fit is comfortable and I can walk all day without sore feet
customer_reviews.text: The fit is comfortable and I can walk all day without sore feet. A little squeaky on floors when I first got them, but after I scuffed them on cement they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: chacha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half size up as suggested. Fit perfectly! Have worn these all day several times and my feet felt good. If you are looking for a stylish, comfortable white sneaker for summer, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: LC Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes because I need to use an insert to cushion the ball of the foot - I will be doing a great amount of walking in Europe. Even though the 9.5 was my size, I needed to go up a half size to accommodate the insert, so with the insert the shoe is neither too big nor too tight. The shoe also offers great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are not very comfortable. I was expecting better from my favorite shoe company. These shoes are very stiff and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MrsT

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sporty casual!
customer_reviews.text: Wore my shoe shopping and my feet were very comfortable! The only problem I had was not with the shoe, but with my socks (peds) constantly slipping down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barboza

customer_reviews.title: BEST SNEAKER
customer_reviews.text: WALKED MILES ON VACATION- HAVE A DISFIGURED FOOT- SO COMFORTABLE-NO PROBLEMS-THE THICK SOLE IS GREAT FOR UNEVEN WALKING SUCH AS COBBLESTONE. BONUS: LOOKS GREAT WITH CASUAL SKIRTS.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet happy
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. Worth the money. Gives me me all day support. My feet are happy when I wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lance Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cute & Supportive
customer_reviews.text: These tennis shoes are so supportive and comfortable, this is my second pair- so I have them in 2 colors. I get lots of compliments on them. The best part is that they fit my narrow feet and have great arch support. . . Two features that are very difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fun kicks for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, these shoes! They are so cute and have a very supportive arch. I have owned Taos before and just ordered the size I have in them and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & but didn't fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the look and color of this shoe but sadly tried 2 sizes but didn't fit my foot - problem in the. 71/2 too small, 8 too long.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn T

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I got them for a trip and wore them awhile at home to 'break ' them in . But they were very nice on the plane and walking in Florida . I'm quite satisfied !
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Stylish but not nearly as comfortable as I expected. The arch and heel support is good, but the shoes rubbed a blister on the back of my foot and I was wearing socks. I don’t mind paying more for good shoes, but at this price, I wouldn’t buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well with spiral AFO
customer_reviews.text: I love this sneaker! I wear a spiral AFO and it fits well - a little slippage in the heal, but it does not interfere with walking. The arch support is higher than a typical sneaker which works well for me. I bought these to wear with dress pants at work and am pleased with the non-athletic look. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Aunt

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.  Not supportive enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is super cute for someone with no foot problems. The shoe was too flat for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Rubbed the back of my heel at first but by the end of second wearing, they were fine. Nice arch support and the color is awesome
customer_reviews.author: heidiw

customer_reviews.title: wide and stiff
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but med width way too wide. Very stiff and klunky.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: New favorites!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for old favorites. They are now my new favorites! Nice quality and true to size
customer_reviews.author: Linis2

customer_reviews.title: So happy !!
customer_reviews.text: So cute !! returned for half a size bigger, they run a bit small. I’m usually an 8 in everything and I had to get an 8.5. They are honestly the cutest shoes I’ve ever had that actually support, will be buying more colors
customer_reviews.author: April Borja

customer_reviews.title: Not my go-to sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Like the color but not the stiff and heavy feeling in the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie from Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute sneakers. Only drawback for me was that the sole seems less flexible than I would prefer. Not worth getting upset.
customer_reviews.author: Writernan

customer_reviews.title: My new best shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I went up 1/2 size as recommended and it is perfect. Good fit and support. I will order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nertz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super comfortable and cute. Went with the advice to go a half size up and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Manning

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable the minute I put them on. I usually wear socks with my sneakers so I ordered a half size larger than normal as recommended and the fit was perfect. The shoes are well made with wonderful arch support. Love the grey color too..might order more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tight in the toe box
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to be comfortable so badly, but the toe box was way too tight. The arch support is really good. I’m sad I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fit as expected. More style than your typical Keds like shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an all-white, well-made, stylish and comfortable sneaker. This shoe has it all. Comfortable right out of the box. Fits true to size. Very good arch support. Haven't spent a lot of time in them as of yet, but I'm confident they'll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: I have wide feet, and these shoes fit.
customer_reviews.text: They're wide enough for me feet, and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mitts

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love the floral print and the sturdiness. Fun to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: like the style
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is cute, like the style. Seems too small. Toe at the end and feel wearing all day would hurt my toe and would be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Mundkowsky

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was similar to my other Taos, which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was similar to my other Taos, which is a half size larger than my normal size. Lots of support for this type of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support!
customer_reviews.text: Planter fasciitis has been my foot enemy for close to two years. Thanks to these shoes, my feet are finally over that. If you are on your feet a lot, don't hesitate. They're worth every penny. On my 2nd pair, ( brand new) and thinking of getting another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: girlgonegreen

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 pair and love them.
customer_reviews.text: I order 1/2 size bigger when I order Taos shoes. I have 3 pair and love them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have a ridiculous number of these because they are comfort, cute and make my feet happy. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: Order a 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing, but I first ordered a 6.5 which is my normal size, they were too small but not by much only because of the arch support in them, returned them and got a 7! they fit amazing. I am a converse wearer but these are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I just had foot surgery and these are exactly what I needed. Super comfortable and good support.
customer_reviews.author: SKIKG

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking. Great price and great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Mikels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love those shoes. I wear them to work and they blend in with my casual clothes very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Did a lot of walking the first day. I didn't feel any heel pain.
customer_reviews.author: joweber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are my 3rd pair. I’d get every color if o could afford them all. Buy a half size up is my recommendation They are truly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Laurila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taos shoes always great when you find a style that works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda DeWees

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st pair I wasn't sure about them but I Love them and decided to order more. Comfort is important and these are that
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes! Love the brand!
customer_reviews.text: The only brand of shoe my feet can handle for 6+ hours on straight concrete.
customer_reviews.author: KaylaC

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support and modern style.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and the arch support. I ordered a half size larger as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie R Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Comfort - true to size and fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Taos. The first pair were so comfortable I wanted another.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker for around town. Good arch support. Only complaint is that the soles seem to wear out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie415

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfortable. I ordered my size 9.5 and they fit perfectly. Glad I didn’t size up. I wear a thin no show sock with them. Now I want to buy a pair in a solid color.
customer_reviews.author: SALLY PROCTOR

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite go to shoes...love them. They fit perfect. I plan to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Magicshel

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers were no narrow I could barely get my foot in it. When I did get my foot in, my foot did not sit fully in the shoe and the back became like a flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Finch

customer_reviews.title: Band aids
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this shoe. Unfortunately the back part of the shoe feels like cardboard and gave me bad blisters.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Style, comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and foot support. I like these better than the Superga's (spelling?) - the laces of which pressed into my feet. These offer better support, as well.
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE A FEW PAIRS OF TAOS SHOES AND LOVE THEM. THESE ARE JUST LIKE THE OTHERS SHOES/BOOTS I HAVE THAT ARE SO VERY COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Kara B.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes, great comfort. Just too white for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of Taos shoes and love them all. They have excellent arch support and are comfortable right out of the box. I had a brown leather pair that I walked all over Europe in a few years ago and got 2 pair of these to wear this year.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Warinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction and product
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneaker. Style and support in one. As described.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker was stiff and uncomfortable. Insoles seemed like a good idea but shoe itself did not have any cushioning. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions and these shoes are quite comfortable. If I do a lot of walking I probably would wear something else though.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes because I need to use an insert to cushion the ball of the foot. Even though the 9.5 was my size, I needed to go up a half size to accommodate the insert. The shoe has great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a great color!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! I generally wear and 8 1/2, but I have worn Taos sneakers before, so I knew I needed to order a half size larger. They fit just like I expected, they are comfortable, and I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: P. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: ... so I ordered a half-sized up and they fit perfect. (I wear a 9 and ordered 9
customer_reviews.text: They for run a little small so I ordered a half-sized up and they fit perfect. (I wear a 9 and ordered 9.5). Have arch support and are very comfortable. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: stolidog

customer_reviews.title: Love the Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The color and pattern are really cute. Go with 1/2 size up. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoes style. They are a little tight but think will break in slightly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive
customer_reviews.text: The most supportive yet attractive pair of shoes Ive ever owned to date!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kittenplan

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern! The arch support for a casual sneaker is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the show, which has amazing arch support but it was too small, so returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tudor Barratt-Scanes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I Want to get all colors! Super cute and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Kelham

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the reviews and ordered a half size larger and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased Taos Star. Ordered 1/2 size up, but were too long. Returned and ordered Plimsoles in 9. True to size. Great arch support. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Trombadore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfortable. The heel just needs a little breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are terrific and fit to size perfectly. Lots of support to the foot. Love the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoes, amazing to for traveling and walking a lot.
